query:
-- Primeiro, pegar o último pedido criado
SELECT 
    poi.id, 
    poi.pickingOrderId, 
    poi.productId,
    p.sku AS productSku,
    poi.requestedQuantity AS quantity,
    poi.inventoryId,
    i.batch AS lot,
    wl.code AS addressCode
FROM pickingOrderItems poi
LEFT JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
LEFT JOIN inventory i ON poi.inventoryId = i.id
LEFT JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id
WHERE poi.pickingOrderId = (SELECT id FROM pickingOrders WHERE status != 'cancelled' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)
ORDER BY poi.productId, i.batch;
